message: Let's be reasonable, 60-40 is a good starting point.
Your turn Alice, but let's be fair. How about a 52.5 / 47.5 split in my favor this time?
Still willing to compromise, 58-42 is the new deal.
Alice, this is getting us nowhere.  I'm dropping my ask slightly again.  Let's settle this before inflation eats our profits!
Come on Bob, meet me in the middle, 57-43 is a fair deal considering the inflation.
